cause.description:
Many of you are already aware of the devastating effects of methane gas on both our environment and our nostrils. The explosion heard in our tent during rafting is only the tip of the iceberg. You say you could smell it from a tent over? I could taste it, it was far and away the worst experience of my life. Colton's reckless behavior must be put to an end. I see only one course of action: a needle and a length of thread. Join me in ridding earth of this plague.
1. Colton is one smelly mofo
cause.name: Stop the Methane Gas Pollution
